oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Certain kinds of food not eaten by adults. By lhan=kasso (L VIII.-30. 8649 and 8650). The |xam do not eat pigs, fish, little birds and many kinds of mice. 1) This story is found in Book VIII-30.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Certain kinds of food, said not to be eaten by adults
